name: IoTHub-DeviceTwin-Task
description: Triggers Azure IoT Hub to update device twin for registerd devices.
author: Daniel Meixner
instanceNameFormat: Trigger IoT Hub to update device twin properties.

inputs.name: IotHubConnectionString
inputs.label: Iot Hub Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection string to Azure IoT Hub. You can find it in portal.azure.com. Looks like HostName=banana.azure-devices.net;SharedAccessKeyName=banana;SharedAccessKey=bananabananabanana=

inputs.name: DeviceTwinPatchString
inputs.label: Device Twin Patch Json
inputs.helpMarkDown: Json formatted string representing the device twin patch.

inputs.name: DeviceQueryString
inputs.label: Device Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: Query string, defaults to SELECT * FROM devices
